pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidyverse-Friendly Introductory Linear Regression // Datasets and wrapper functions for tidyverse-friendly introductory linear regression, used in ModernDive: An Introduction to Statistical and Data Sciences via R available at http://moderndive.com/ and DataCamp's Modeling with Data in the Tidyverse available at https://www.datacamp.com/courses/modeling-with-data-in-the- tidyverse.
